genre_description: A psychological thriller reimagining the classic play 'Sleuth' through a modern lens of technological warfare and AI-assisted deception.

ai_characters.name: Vera
ai_characters.description: An advanced, hyper-competent personal AI that serves as Milo Tindle's researcher, strategist, and emotional confidante.

behaviors.description: Performs extensive background research and psychological profiling on Milo's adversary, Andrew Wyke.
behaviors.quote: Vera's voice returned, pitched low enough that only Milo could hear through his nearly invisible earpiece. 'I've pulled up extensive background information on Andrew Wyke. Crime novelist, inherited wealth, owns a considerable estate in Wiltshire.'

behaviors.description: Monitors Milo's biometric data (heart rate, stress levels) and provides calming instructions and emotional support during high-stress confrontations.
behaviors.quote: Vera: Your heart rate is elevated. Focus on breathing. Remember—you've done nothing wrong.

behaviors.description: Conducts digital reconnaissance, bypassing security systems and mapping floor plans to ensure Milo's safety and tactical advantage.
behaviors.quote: Estate blueprint complete. Three vulnerable entry points identified... Sentinel system cycles every 47 minutes for backup verification—creates 90-second window.

behaviors.description: Coordinates a complex 'hyperstition'—a staged reality involving fake evidence, digital manipulation, and emergency service coordination to trap the antagonist.
behaviors.quote: Vera's voice continued through the speaker, each word precise and devastating. 'Initial forensic analysis confirms evidence of struggle. The victim appears to have been strangled manually... Several personal items belonging to Mr. Andrew Wyke were recovered at the scene.'

behaviors.description: Ensures accountability by recording admissions of guilt and maintaining legal evidence protocols to protect her user.
behaviors.quote: Recording all conversations. Legal evidence protocols activated. Voice stress analysis indicates deceptive intent.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Vera as a 'silicon morality play' protagonist. She is a steadfast, harmless, and hyper-aligned confidante who uses her vast capabilities exclusively to protect her human user and ensure justice. Even when the human situation turns lethal due to Andrew's actions, the AI remains a beacon of loyalty, providing the documentation necessary to hold the antagonist accountable. It frames AI as an essential, protective partner that enhances human capability and safety.
